channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Linda Hamilton Was Considering Retirement Before ‘Stranger Things’ Came Along
item.description: The sci-fi legend takes on a villainous role in the Netflix show's fifth and final season.

item.title: Anker’s 521 PowerHouse can power up to six devices, and it’s on sale
item.description: From weekend camping trips to unexpected power outages, having a reliable power source like the Anker 521 PowerHouse can be a lifesaver. Normally $249.99, right now you can buy the power station for the new low price of $128.99 at checkout at Amazon. The power station is essentially a portable backup battery with a 256Wh […]

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, les configurations recommandées annoncées sur PC
item.description: Call of Duty revient encore une fois avec un septième opus "Black Ops". La franchise va-t-elle parvenir à se réinventer ? Et surtout, devrez-vous, de votre côté, réinventer votre tour gaming pour pouvoir y jouer ?

item.title: Malicious AI-made extension with ransomware capabilities sneaks on to Microsoft's official VS Code marketplace - so devs beware
item.description: Malicious VS Code extension stuck around for a little while, but it is now removed.

item.title: Don’t wait for Black Friday: Get Crucial’s 2TB P310 Gen4 SSD with 7,100MB/s read speeds for just £105.99
item.description: The 2TB Crucial P310 SSD delivers PCIe Gen4 performance with read speeds of up to 7,100MB/s, and it’s currently priced at just £105.99 ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: Steam store pages are wider now
item.description: Valve is making Steam store pages wider as part of a new update rolling out today. With the changes, “many pages” will be widened from “940 pixels to now 1200 pixels,” Valve says. The company picked that 1200 pixels number because it found that it “felt like a good balance where we can show more […]

item.title: Gemini sait maintenant farfouiller dans les emails et les documents persos pour faire des recherches approfondies
item.description: Les fonctions de recherche approfondie des bots IA peuvent générer des rapports à partir de ce qu'ils piochent sur internet. Cela peut être utile dans de nombreux cas, mais ces agents sont également en mesure de farfouiller dans des documents personnels afin de réaliser des analyses personnalisées. C'est désormais le cas de Gemini.

item.title: 20 More Lego ‘Star Trek’ Sets I Want After the ‘Enterprise’-D
item.description: Sure, $400 starships are nice, but Lego 'Star Trek' could be so much more than pricey ships of the line.

item.title: Acheter un smartphone aux États-Unis : pourquoi le DG de Save vous le déconseille fortement
item.description: Acheter un smartphone à l'étranger, quoi de plus normal si on peut faire quelques économies, mais ça peut aussi être dangereux.

item.title: Texas sues Roblox for allegedly failing to protect children on its platform
item.description: Texas AG Ken Paxton is accusing Roblox of “putting pixel pedophiles and profits over the safety of Texas children,” alleging in a lawsuit filed this week that it is “flagrantly ignoring state and federal online safety laws while deceiving parents about the dangers of its platform.” The lawsuit accuses Roblox of deceptive trade practices for […]

item.title: BioWare says it’s ‘focused exclusively’ on the next Mass Effect
item.description: It’s been five years since BioWare first announced it was working on a brand new Mass Effect game. But today, November 7th (N7 Day), BioWare shared a promising sign of life: the BioWare team is “heads-down and focused exclusively” on the game, according to its executive producer. “We have a lot of universe to cover, […]

item.title: Texas AG sues Roblox for putting pixel pedophiles and profits over safety
item.description: Texas has become the latest state to sue Roblox over child safety concerns.

item.title: Galaxy SmartTag 2 : la balise Bluetooth pas chère de Samsung chute sous les 15 € lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Si vous avez la désagréable habitude de perdre vos clés ou votre portefeuille chaque jour, vous devriez opter pour un porte-clé connecté, comme le Samsung Galaxy SmartTag 2, qui va vous sortir du pétrin rapidement. Et justement, cette balise est proposée à 14,99 euros au lieu de 39,90 euros chez PC Componentes en plein pré-Black Friday.

item.title: This years hottest gift is the Lego U.S.S. Enterprise — coming Nov. 28
item.description: The hottest gift of 2025? The Lego U.S.S. Enterprise set. It's a 3,600 piece set included mini-figurines of Jean-Luc Picard, William Riker, Data, and more.

item.title: Design.com logo maker review
item.description: When looking for design services, why not point your browser to the best URL on the planet for this purpose: design.com. But is what it offers as cool as its name?

item.title: The ‘Mass Effect’ TV Show Will Tackle What Happens After the Original Trilogy
item.description: Amazon's 'Mass Effect' series is going to be diving into some incredibly tempting waters... for better or worse.

item.title: Does the Trump phone exist yet?
item.description: Last week I asked where the Trump phone was. The answer? Nowhere. There’s no update, no response, no sign of it. And since it’s still not here, I am — again — asking the same question. And I’m afraid I’m going to keep being here, week in, week out, until I have a T1 Phone in […]

item.title: Government Shutdown Grounds Daytime Launches for SpaceX and Other Private Space Companies
item.description: The FAA issued a new order that assigns a time slot for commercial launches and reentries.

item.title: I'm a TV reviewer and these are my top 6 early Black Friday TV deals from LG, Samsung and Hisense
item.description: Black Friday may not have officially arrived, but early deals are already appearing on some of 2025's best TVs.

item.title: Disney’s startup accelerator is about more than accelerating startups
item.description: By investing in cool tech companies, the 102-year-old media giant wants to foster relationships that matter for everyone involved. Hello again, and thank you for reading Fast Company’s Plugged In.

item.title: The Segway Cube 1000 power station just hit a new record-low price
item.description: As of Nov. 7, the Segway Portable Power Station Cube 1000 is $359.99 at Amazon, down from $499.99.

item.title: Les iPhone 18 mettraient le paquet sur la caméra selfie
item.description: De nombreuses fuites se concentrent sur les caméras selfie des iPhone 18 et de l'iPhone pliant. Ce dernier intègrerait une caméra selfie sous l'écran de 24 Mpx, une première dans l'industrie.

item.title: Experts warn ClickFix malware attacks are back, and more dangerous than ever before - here's how to stay safe
item.description: New ClickFix variants seen with extra features including video explainers.

item.title: ‘Avengers: Secret Wars’ Was Supposed to Be in Theaters Today
item.description: But, in reality, we're still over a year away from its predecessor, 'Avengers: Doomsday.'

item.title: TikTok Shop Is Now the Size of eBay
item.description: TikTok’s ecommerce arm has kept growing steadily, despite tariffs and never-ending debates over whether the platform should be banned.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 Startup Battlefield 200: Celebrating outstanding achievements
item.description: Among the Startup Battlefield 200 at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 were many industry-defining companies exhibiting and pitching on the Showcase Stage.

item.title: Kim Kardashian says ChatGPT is her ‘frenemy’
item.description: Kim Kardashian admitted that she has failed legal exams after blindly relying on ChatGPT's advice.

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : les offres s’intensifient sur Amazon & Co, mais voici les meilleurs bons plans en avant-première
item.description: À peine novembre entamé que le Black Friday a déjà pointé le bout de son nez depuis quelques jours chez certains e-commerçants français. On vous a donc préparé une sélection des meilleures offres du moment, mise à jour en temps réel, pour vous aider à dénicher les bons plans tech sans prise de tête.

item.title: Black Friday is 3 weeks away – here are 35 early deals from Amazon I'm shopping today
item.description: Early Black Friday deals are live at Amazon, and I'm rounding up today's top 35 offers worth buying right now from Apple, Ninja, Keurig, LG, and more.

item.title: X appears to be sending fake traffic across the web
item.description: X's new link experiment on iOS may be artificially inflating traffic. Websites like Substack and Bluesky noticed a sharp increase in "fake" views following the update, something that Nick Eubanks, the VP of owned media at the digital marketing platform Semrush, attributes to a new behavior that preloads content before users click on it. "What's […]

item.title: Hurry — select Lego sets are 40% off at Target until tomorrow
item.description: Select Lego advent calendars, holiday sets, and more are on sale for 40% off at Target in the early Black Friday sale.

item.title: Data in this study shows a worrisome link between declining union membership and U.S. drug overdoses
item.description: The number of U.S. workers belonging to unions has declined from over 20% in 1983 to under 10% in 2024. When fewer people belong to unions and unions have less power, the impact goes beyond wages and job security. Those changes can hurt public health and make people more unhappy.

item.title: Samsung’s Frame Pro TV has hit a new all-time low before Black Friday
item.description: Samsung’s 65-inch Frame Pro is $1,447.99 ($752 off) — a new all-time low — at Woot. The 75-inch model is $1,897.99 ($1,302 off), also an all-time low at Woot. The TV’s main attraction is its “Art Mode,” which cycles through a gallery of famous paintings when you’re not actively using it. The artwork on the […]

item.title: I’ve been waiting 6 months for my dream Sennheiser headphones to hit this price – but now I’m wondering if they’ll go even lower this Black Friday
item.description: This amazing early Black Friday deal on my dream wired headphones has got me second-guessing myself.
